item.title: Need an auto save tut plzzz
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

Purpose: to add a autosaver for all servers

Difficulty: 2

Assumed Knowledge: how 2 read search copy and paste

Server Base: testscape

Classes Modified: client.java

credits: 90% me 10% killamess
killamess made this but a long time ago but never reposted it so im posting it

  1. ok search for

public boolean superRestore = false;

  1. above that add

public static boolean AutoSave = false; public int savecounter = 0;

  1. next search for

public boolean process() {

  1. once found that line add this under

savecounter++; if(savecounter >= 120 && AutoSave == false) { AutoSave = true; savecounter = 0; }

  1. next search for

if(firingspell == true)

  1. once found add this above it
   savecounter++;
      if(savecounter >= 120 && AutoSave == false) {
         AutoSave = true;
         savecounter = 0;
      }
  1. save and compile then it will auto save

Credits: xdeathxmagex

Read full topic
